channel.title: Hugo on Kigo's Blog - 백엔드 Java 개발자
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Kigo's Blog - 백엔드 Java 개발자

item.title: Starting a Development Blog with Hugo and GitHub Pages
item.description: Hello! I’ve finally started a development blog. In this post, I’d like to summarize the process of creating a blog using Hugo and GitHub Pages.

item.title: Complete Hugo Blog Posting Guide - Tips from Real Experience
item.description: Based on the trial and error I experienced while running a Hugo blog, I’ll share efficient posting methods and useful tips. This will be especially helpful if you’re using it with GitHub Pages.
